topics.body:
So apparently Greece is probably going to default.

What is at stake?
Well if Greece doesn't get a bailout that would cause a economic chain reaction through the euro.  They could also leave the EU or this shit could just wind up getting shoved under the carpet again.


Tl:dr; if you live in europe sucks to be you.
